1. A blue circular object (possibly a ball) is located near the bottom center of the image.
2. A green circular object (possibly another ball) is positioned above the blue object, slightly to the left.
3. Two black lines form a V-shape, likely representing a platform or boundary.
4. The background appears to be white, suggesting a plain surface.

    {"bbox_2d": [60, 168, 150, 250], "label": "purple wall"}

```
